description: From Middle English overbitterli, equivalent to overbitter +â€Ž -ly.

adverbs.description: overbitterly (comparative more overbitterly, superlative most overbitterly)

examples: I just wanted to say this much, for, though dangerous to dwell on in a common way, it seems to me just the sort of help which one's infirmity might need and thankfully receive when the sense of being calumniated comes overbitterly upon us.
